mapper.insert: insert into article(title, content, writer, fix) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{fix})
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate, fix, replyCnt from article where bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: update article set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updatedate = now() where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate, fix, replyCnt from article where bno > 0
select count(bno) from article where bno > 0;
